sub_title:
SAP and Microsoft Consultant with a passion for technology.      
"Make it work, make it right, make it fast & secure."
summary:
I've been developing software since I was a little youngling. Having started with quick basic, turbo pascal I worked my way up through yearly iterations of new software languages, patterns and concepts eventually ending up in the SAP stack (2004 onward) with a heavy 'side' investment in Microsoft .NET. Both of which I use daily and have incorporated both professionally as well as privately (Yes I used to have a local SAP Mini install when that was still a thing)

Countless hobby programming projects and a broad interest in technology as well as a general interest in machines have given me an uncanny ability to dissect complex problems into manageable bytes (pun intended) as well as a capability to turn customer requirements into actual practical and usable solutions.

I've played and worked with hundreds of different tools, patterns, models and have effectively turned my childhood programming hobby into my full time carreer.

Some people may say I am a work-a-holic (often doing more than one project at a time) but I like to think of it as fun rather than work.

Are you looking for an extremely (!) dedicated SAP Technical consultant or just an excellent all-round developer then you have come to the right place. I hold myself to an exacting standard and will happily tap away on my keyboard during evenings or weekends to provide not only what is required but also what is desired. 

Over-delivery is the name of the game. 

P.s. in these confusing times I'd like to point out that I am a very capable and communicative remote worker providing consistent updates and progress. Happy to operate for any Dutch, English or German speaking company anywhere in the world. Teach me another language and I'll add that too ;)

projects.description: Develop a SAP ABAP function module providing customer creation functionality for all levels of SAP customer master and sales data capable being called as a SOAP webservice. Provide training and code samples to integrate the webservice configuration into an existing .NET web application.

projects.title: Cadent - SAP Portal/Hana Migration
projects.description: Provide senior technical development consultancy for an  ECC to S4 upgrade project within the customer landscape in which core SAP systems are upgraded to S4 (From ECC) whilst retaining existing (10 year old legacy systems) such as SAP portals, Agentry servers, ESRI map integrators and other third party systems. Design and develop integration solutions to bridge the 10 year long upgrade gap across multiple technological stacks and systems.

contributors.headline:

projects.title: Royal Dutch shell - WRFM - HANA XS Portal
projects.description:
Design and Implement a comprehensive web portal application capable of visualizing Shell's extensive equipment library providing a framework to attach reports to specific hierarchy nodes, dynamically linking of UI elements to SAP HANA database information and integrating into pre-existing Shell development and maintenance procedures.
Built on SAP HANA XS using Javascript, KendoUI, XSJS, ODATA and other front-end technologies.

contributors.headline:
SAP and Microsoft Consultant with a passion for technology.      
"Make it work, make it right, make it fast & secure."

projects.title: Royal Dutch Shell Bangalore Agile Architect
projects.description: Analyze current Hana platform practices based on Agile, Development, Testing, Delivery and support. Identify bottlenecks, risks and challenges within the various processes. Provide high level and individual processes to ensure a better and faster delivery can take place whilst reducing risks and blockers. Develop detailed approaches to work handling in agile, information handling, development using tracks and unit testing as well as integrate support requirements into all levels of the process. On-site role in Bangalore

contributors.headline:

projects.title: Northern gas Network GEMS BCM
projects.description: NGN required the construction of multiple applications to enhance current work order and damage order processes. The creation of multiple applications in different technologies was required. A SAPUI5 damages application (generic forms) running on the SAP Cloud platform capable of communicating with an S/4 Hana system. An order storage, display and print module for an emergency backup system (Stand-alone infrastructure) created in Microsoft technologies running on an Amazon AWS stack. Additionally a stand-alone order status monitoring utility to provide an overview of all work orders running into a specific state allowing emergency repair crews to be coordinated and dispatched (based on Microsoft technologies running on Amazon AWS)

contributors.headline:

projects.title: Vodafone - SIDD Processor
projects.description: Develop the processing logic for the SIDD (swap, insurance swap, demo and dummy) processes that allow for the exchange or swapping of vodafone devices at the various vodafone stores. Catalogue data is provided through pre-existing processes and processed in background tasks creating appropriate SIDD materials in the SAP MDM database.

profile_positions.description: As an aspiring principal Consultant cross any technological boundary in order to provide best of breed business software solutions capable of running on any device connecting to any system. Drive existing technologies to their maximum reach leveraging core development languages such as SAP ABAP, JAVA, .NET (and others) in any number of software engineering methodologies.
profile_positions.title: Senior ERP Consultant

profile_positions.description:
In a role as senior SAP consultants work on a wide variety of technical and functional projects ranging from SAP implementations, full software development cycles in Microsoft, Java and SAP technologies providing expertise, development skills and consultancy to bring projects to a successful conclusion.

Please view projects for more details on individual assignments at various customers.
profile_positions.title: Senior SAP Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Design, develop and implement applications ranging from ABAP, ABAP OO to JAVA and .NET in a multitude of environments such as SAP, Windows, SAP portal. Integrate 3rd party applications into core systems and / or provide appropriate interfacing methodologies.

Provide technical expertise towards the implementation of projects and manage IT projects / customer expectations where needed.
profile_positions.title: Business Application Analyst / Developer

profile_positions.description:
In a role as all-round developer and IT specialist design, develop, deploy and maintain a wide variety of software built in a multitude of languages and running on various different platforms. 

Provide expertise on business decisions and provide pragmatic and user friendly business solutions for business units ranging from upper management to general services.
profile_positions.title: Business Application Developer

profile_positions.description: Professional Trainee describes a process of 4 months of intense SAP training followed up by consultancy work at various companies.
